reviews.review:
Super hra velice lep≈°√≠ akce ne≈æ v epizodƒõ 1 a klasick√Ωm hlf2 .
Douf√°m ≈æe se nƒõkdy do≈æiju  Half lifu 3 nebo ep 3
Where is HL3?! I want revenge, dammit!

Half-Life 2: Episode Two... neviem ako spravne zacat tuto recenziu, za inych okolnosti by som asi napisal ze tento part.2 sluzi ako spojovnik medzi epizodami a pripravka na velke finale. No ako uz vieme (okrem toho ze sme sa uz ziadnej dalsej epizody nedockali) tak ani "Episode Three"  by nemala bohvieake epicke zakoncenie a skoncilo by to zase otvorenym koncom. Na tom by sice nebolo nic zle ak by mala saga nadalej pokracovat. Lenze ako to vsetko dopadlo uz asi vsetci vieme. Bola to takpovediac zrada zo strany Valve a kopanec do slabin komunite ktora sa za tie roky sa rozrastla a stala sa jednou s najaktivnejsich na hernej scene. Lenze kto by na druhej strane cakal ze nejaky (vtedy este pomerne upozadeny) klient Steam sa stane majoritnym prijmom Valve kde sa budu tocit miliardove obraty. A tak si casom soudruzi vo Valve povedali, ved naco sa namahat...

Som odchovanec na Valve hrach, ale aj ked patrim roky medzi ich obdivovatelov a hajitelov tak tuto kritiku si musia vyzrat. Svojou dlhorocnou necinnostou docielili akorat toho ze sa im rozpadla komunita, taktiez vdaka pasivite a agresivnej cenovej politike si poniektori vydavatelia ako Electronic Arts a Ubisoft zalozili vlastnych klientov a hracom takto zbytocne rozstiepili kniznice. Kedysi ked vladli retail edicie hier si kamenne obchody brali cez 50% provizie no Valve to zoskrtalo na 30% (Tak ako Apple, Microsoft a im podobne) lenze ako pribudali roky aj herna scena sa menila, stala sa viac mainstreamova co znamenalo aj postupne znizenie cien hier (i ked ich vyroba bola coraz nakladnejsia) a tiez nastup indie sceny. Valve sa ohladom svojej cenovej politiky nadalej drzalo svojich zauzivanych standardov a odmietalo sa reformovat a prave vdaka tomu umoznili nastup Epic Games s tym ich store ktory este viac deformuje hernu scenu svojimi exkluzivitami. (Nie lepsou cenovou politikou pre zakaznika ani sluzbami, hlavne aby boli spokojni vydavatelia hier z percentami ktore si stejne nechaju pre seba a vyvojarom daju stejne to iste nic ako by dostali inde)

Polozte si teda vy vsetci hajitelia Epic store otazku - je toto cesta ako zlepsit hernu scenu? Ak si myslite ze ano, tak potom ste budto blbi, alebo tak naivn√≠, ze vam na potlacenie kritickeho myslenia staci tych par hier zdarma. Historia sa len opakuje... Epic Games sa snazi presne o to, co kedysi Valve a to najst si dalsi potencionalny a stabilny prijem ak uz ich prestane bavit vyvijat hry. A uz sa to pomaly deje, kde je dnes znacka Unreal/Unreal Tournament? Vykaslali sa dokonca aj na seriu Gears of War, Bulletstorm, Shadow Complex... Zachrancovia hernej sceny ktori opustaju vlastne velke znacky. Jedine sa spoliehaju na Fortnite (ako Valve na DOTA a Counter-Strike) a snazia sa otvorit svoj druhy front prijmu presne ako Valve zo svojim Steamom a este im za to poniektori tlieskaju. Nehovoriac este o tom, ze v pripade Epic Games tu je dalsi jeden velky hrac - Cinsky Tencent ktory sa nepriamo zapaja do udalosti, ktory uz ma chapadla nielen v hernom ale aj v tom filmovom priemysle. Ale opat to vyzera tak, ze urcite myslienky totalitnej krajiny niesu poniektorym cudzie - ved hry zdarma. Ale este je tu nadej a ako sa hovori, vsetko zle je na nieco dobre a aspon to prinutilo Valve nieco s touto situaciou robit, ak zaboduje s pokracovanim Half Life: Alyx bude mat saga dvere otvorene na pokracovania (uz teraz je ich VR set Valve Index vypredany)

Vyzera to tak, ze som (opat) trocha odbocil od tematu recenzie, tak asi len poviem ze pribeh Episode Two vystihuje celu situaciu v sucastnosti okolo Valve a je len v ich silach aby nam este ukazali ze dokazu povstat z popola tak ako sa to snad podari nasim protagonistom a znicit rasu Epic Games ehm Combine a dockat sa lepsich zajtrajskov...

+ Pribeh a atmosfera, co je zakladny kamen u tejto serie
+ (Staro-nove) postavy na scene, novy nepriatelia
+ Opat vylepsena hratelnost postavena na Gravity Gun

- Otvoreny koniec s nejasnou buducnostou serie (stale dufame a verime)
- Nieje jasne co sa stalo s Barnym (evakuaciu z City 17 prezil - snad)
- Opat kratsia epizoda, kedy sa mozno cakalo na velke finale ktore ale neprislo

Verdikt: 9/10 = (Zatial) posledna epizoda serie s otvorenym koncom na ktory sa caka uz viac nez dekadu. Len je otazne ci by sa jednalo o skutocny koniec ked nedavno bol zverejneny scenar konca tretej epizody ktoru osobne dal na internet spisovatel Marc Laidlaw. Neostava teda nic ine len dufat a verit ze "intermezzo" Half Life Alyx uspeje na celej ciare a otvori tymto Valve oci.
Excellent game, though it is a little buggy, I managed to get outside the map with the car, softlocked myself.
buenisimo pero saquen la tres oe ptm
OK I guess I'll just wait for a continuation...

The fact that the voiceactor of Alyx Vance speaks a majority of the developer commentary makes it feel unique. I love this game.

The fight area's are amazing and intense. I also loved driving around for a good portion of the game. Overall, an amazing game that I enjoyed as much as the others. When will they make half-life 3, it is long overdue and the series needs a good ending.

Still waiting for an episode 3

The only HL game I didn't play on release. Vastly superior to both HL 2 and episode 1.  The style is a merger of roam, oldschool 90s shooter action, and characters that actually have useful and interesting things to say. Unlike episode 1, you're not chained to your garbage sidekick, and the game tends to take her away, or quite literally, force her to wait in the car. (yes, you eventually get a car)
Also unlike HL2 and episode 1, they knew what weapons people cared about, so the first thing they give you is the shotgun, followed shortly by the python, and the ever present scattered garbage pistols and grenades left everywhere. Unlike episode 1, where the crowbar is only available for the last 20 minutes of the game, here it's available once you're past the prologue, as it should be. Due to not having an immortal sidekick at all times, fights are far more challenging, but still not really hard. The puzzles that started all the way back in the 90s culminates with a bridge you need to balance to get a car across. The scale of the puzzle is actually impressive, even almost 15 years later.

As everybody knows by now, the story (which was never a strong point of HL; get over yourselves) ends on a cliffhangar. As a shooter,  it's extremely competent, addictive, and fun, The opposite of episode 1. I wouldn't be surprised if different people worked on the different episodes. Episode 2 compares favorably to opposing force, the best HL game of all time. Since Valve no longer makes real games for real people, OP4 will remain the best HL game forever, and Ep2 the second best.

Note, however, its rather short length. Action-packed, and full of fun, yes, but it's still short. Worth playing through a couple times, at least, I was honestly surprised Valve themselves managed to salvage HL2. As said in the opening, I didn't play this game on release. Only now, years later, have I gotten to it, and it's surprisingly solid.
Makes you wish Valve still made games, don't it? I digress.

Episode 2? A glowing recommendation for people who want some oldschool shooters in their lives, and don't mind that it'll last about 3-8 hours. Avoid episoded 1 - it's a waste of your money, but play this game.
There's 333 Antlion Grubs to kill. GG Valve, GG.
The only bad thing about this game is that it never got a sequel.
Este episodio cierra bien el final de la saga Half Life

Half-life 2 episode 2 is very overrated, all the major plot points in this episode are so contrived, especially the ending. Things happen simply because they do, no rhyme or reason behind it. Most people wish that half-life 3 would come out, I just wish that I never played half-life 2 to begin with. Genuinely a waste of time by today's standards, in my opinion.

well, this is it. although i finished this game just now, i understand how much it means to wait for another sequel HL game. 
this game is amazing piece of work, i just wish i had played this sooner.
